alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:21PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A few strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Nance, northeastern Merrick and northeastern Polk Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1020 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms between Fullerton and Genoa, or 28 miles west of Columbus, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fullerton, Genoa and Silver Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
